Verses: 1 naangal Avargalai Vittup Pirindhu, Thuraipeyarndhapinbu, Neraayodi, Kostheevaiyum, Marunaalil Rodhutheevaiyum Serndhu, Avvidam Vittup Paththaaraa Pattanaththukku Vandhu,
2 ange Penikke Dhesaththirkuppogira Oru Kappalaik Kandu, Adhile Eripponom.
3 seeppurutheevaik Kandu, Adhai Idadhupuramaaga Vittu, Seeriyaanaattirku Odi, Theerupattanaththuraiyil Iranginom; Ange Kappalin Sarakkugalai Irakkavendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
4 avvidaththilulla Seesharaik Kandupidiththu, Ange Ezhunaal Thanginom. Avargal Pavulai Nokki: Neer Erusalemukkup Pogavendaam Endru Aaviyin Evudhalinaale Sonnaargal.

5 andha Naatkal Niraiverinapinbu, Naangal Purappattuppogaiyil, Avargalellaarum Manaivigalodum Pillaigalodunkoodap Pattanaththukkup Purambe Engalai Vazhivittanuppumpadi Vandhaargal. Appozhudhu Kadarkaraiyile Naangal Muzhangaarpadiyittu Jebampanninom.
6 oruvaridaththiloruvar Uththaravu Petrukkondapinbu, Naangal Kappal Erinom; Avargal Thangal Veedugalukkuth Thirumbipponaargal.
7 naangal Kappalyaaththiraiyai Mudiththu, Theerupattanaththai Vittup Piththolomaai Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Sagodhararai Vinavi, Avargalidaththil Orunaal Thanginom.

8 marunaalile Pavulaich Serndhavargalaagiya Naangal Purappattuch Sesariyaapattanaththukku Vandhu, Ezhuperil Oruvanaagiya Pilippennum Suviseshaganudaiya Veettile Piravesiththu, Avanidaththil Thanginom.
9 theerkkadharisananjsollugira Kanniyaasthireegalaagiya Naalu Kumaaraththigal Avanukku Irundhaargal.
10 naangal Aneganaal Ange Thangiyirukkaiyil, Agapu Ennum Perkonda Oru Theerkkadharisi Yoodheyaavilirundhu Vandhaan.

11 avan Engalidaththil Vandhu, Pavulinudaiya Kachchaiyai Eduththuth Than Kaigalaiyum Kaalgalaiyum Kattikkondu: Indhak Kachchaiyaiyudaiyavanai Erusalemilulla Yoodhar Ivvidhamaaik Kattip Purajaadhiyaar Kaigalil Oppukkoduppaargal Endru Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Sollugiraar Endraan.
12 ivaigalai Naangal Kettapozhudhu, Erusalemukkup Pogavendaamendru, Naangalum Avvidaththaarum Avanai Vendikkondom.

13 adharkup Pavul: Neengal Azhudhu En Irudhayaththai En Udaindhupogappannugireergal? Erusalemil Naan Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththirkaagak Kattappaduvadharkumaaththiramalla, Marippadharkum Aayaththamaayirukkiren Endraan.
14 avan Sammadhiyaadhapadiyinaale, Karththarudaiya Siththam Aagakkadavadhendru Amarndhirundhom.
15 andha Naatkalukkuppinbu Naangal Pirayaana Saamaangalai Aayaththampannikkondu Erusalemukkup Ponom.

16 sesariyaapattanaththilulla Seesharil Silar Engaludanekooda Vandhadhumandri, Seeppurutheevaanaagiya Minaason Ennum Oru Pazhaiya Seeshanidaththile Naangal Thangumpadiyaaga Avanaiyum Thangalode Koottikkonduvandhaargal.
17 naangal Erusalemukku Vandhabodhu, Sagodharar Engalaich Sandhoshamaai Etrukkondaargal.
18 marunaalile Pavul Engalaik Koottikkondu, Yaakkobinidaththirkup Ponaan; Moopparellaarum Ange Koodivandhaargal.
19 avargalai Avan Vinavi, Than Oozhiyaththinaale Dhevan Purajaadhigalidaththil Seydhavaigalai Ovvondraai Vivariththuchchonnaan.

20 adhai Avargal Kettuk Karththarai Magimaippaduththinaargal. Pinbu Avargal Avanai Nokki: Sagodharane, Yoodhargalukkul Anegamaayiramper Visuvaasigalaayirukkiradhaip Paarkkireere, Avargalellaarum Niyaayappiramaanaththukkaaga Vairaakkiyamullavargalaayirukkiraargal.

21 purajaadhigalidaththilirukkira Yoodharellaarum Thangal Pillaigalukku Viruththasedhanampannavum, Muraimaigalinpadi Nadakkavum Venduvadhillaiyendru Neer Solli, Ivvidhamaai Avargal Moseyai Vittup Pirindhupogumpadi Podhikkireerendru Ivargal Ummaikkuriththuk Kelvippattirukkiraargal.
22 ippozhudhu Seyyavendiyadhu Enna? Neer Vandhirukkireerendru Ivargal Kelvippattu, Nichchayamaagak Koottankooduvaargal.
23 aagaiyaal Naangal Umakkuch Sollugirapadi Neer Seyyavendum; Adhennavendraal, Piraarththanai Pannikkondavargalaagiya Naaluper Engalidaththil Irukkiraargal.

24 avargalai Neer Serththukkondu, Avargaludanekoodach Suththigarippu Seydhukondu, Avargal Thalaichchavarampannikkolvadharkuch Sellumaanadhaich Selavuseyyum; Appadich Seydhaal Ummaikkuriththuk Kelvippatta Kaariyangal Abaththamendrum, Neerum Niyaayappiramaanaththaik Kaikkondu Nadakkiravarendrum Ellaarum Arindhukolvaargal.

25 visuvaasigalaana Purajaadhiyaar Ippadippattavaigalaik Kaikkollaamal, Vikkiragangalukkup Padaiththathirkum, Raththaththirkum, Nerukkundu Seththadhirkum, Vesiththanaththirkum, Vilagiyirukkavendumendru Naangal Theermaanampanni, Avargalukku Ezhudhiyanuppinome Endraargal.

26 appozhudhu Pavul Andha Manusharaich Serththukkondu, Marunaalile Avargaludanekoodath Thaanum Suththigarippu Seydhukondu, Dhevaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Avargalil Ovvoruvanukkaaga Vendiya Baliseluththith Theerumalavum Suththigarippu Naatkalai Niraivetruvenendru Ariviththaan.
27 andha Ezhunaatkalum Niraiveri Varugaiyil, Aasiyaanaattilirundhu Vandha Yoodhargal Avanai Dhevaalayaththile Kandu, Janangalellaaraiyum Eduththuvittu, Avanmel Kaipottu:

28 isravelare, Udhaviseyyungal. Nammudaiya Janaththirkum Vedhappiramaanaththirkum Indha Sthalaththirkum Virodhamaaga Engum Ellaarukkum Podhiththuvarugiravan Ivandhaan; Indha Dhevaalayaththirkulle Girekkaraiyum Koottikkonduvandhu, Indhap Parisuththa Sthalaththaith Theettuppaduththinaan Endru Saththamittaargal.
29 ebesiyanaagiya Thuroppeemu Enbavan Munne Nagaraththil Pavuludanekooda Irukkiradhaik Kandirundhapadiyaal, Pavul Avanai Dhevaalayaththil Koottikkonduvandhiruppaanendru Ninaiththaargal.
30 appozhudhu Nagaramuzhuvadhum Kalakkamutradhu; Janangal Koottamaai Odivandhu, Pavulaip Pidiththu, Avanai Dhevaalayaththirkup Purambe Izhuththukkonduponaargal; Udane Kadhavugal Poottappattadhu.
31 avargal Avanaik Kolaiseyya Eththaniththirukkaiyil, Erusalem Muzhuvadhum Kalakkamaayirukkiradhendru Porchchevagarin Senaabadhikkuch Seydhivandhadhu.

32 udane Avan Porchchevagaraiyum Avargaludaiya Adhibadhigalaiyum Koottikkondu, Avargalidaththirku Odinaan; Senaabadhiyaiyum Porchchevagaraiyum Avargal Kandabodhu Pavulai Adikkiradhai Vittu Niruththinaargal.
33 appozhudhu Senaabadhi Kittavandhu Avanaip Pidiththu, Irandu Sangiligalinaale Kattumpadi Solli: Ivan Yaarendrum Enna Seydhaan Endrum Visaariththaan.
34 adharku Janangal Palavidhamaaich Saththamittaargal; Sandhadiyinaale Nichchayaththai Avan Ariyakkoodaamal, Avanaik Kottaikkulle Kondupogumpadi Kattalaiyittaan.
35 avan Padigalmel Erinabodhu Janakkoottam Thirandu Pinsendru,
36 ivanai Agatrum Endru Ukkiramaaik Kooppittapadiyinaale, Porchsevagar Avanaith Thookkikkondu Pogavendiyadhaayirundhadhu.
37 avargal Pavulaik Kottaikkulle Kondupogira Samayaththil, Avan Senaabadhiyai Nokki: Naan Ummudane Oru Vaarththai Pesalaamaa Endraan. Adharku Avan: Unakkuk Girekkubaashai Theriyumaa?
38 nee Indha Naatkalukkumunne Kalagamundaakki, Naalaayirang Kolaipaadhagarai Vanaandharaththirkuk Kondupona Egipdhiyan Allavaa Endraan.
39 adharkup Pavul: Naan Silisiyaa Naattilulla Keerththipetra Tharsupattanaththu Yoodhan; Janangaludane Pesumpadi Enakku Uththaravaagavendumendru Ummai Vendikkollugiren Endraan.
40 uththaravaanabodhu, Pavul Padigalinmel Nindru Janangalaip Paarththuk Kaiyamarththinaan; Migundha Amaidhalundaayitru; Appozhudhu Avan Ebireyubaashaiyile Pesaththodanginaan.
